How to Use All The Tags

This page shows every tag you should use on Memepedia. Copy, tweak, and make memes.

Headings

Use headings to organize your article.

<H1> = Big ahh header

<H2> = Smaller header

<H3> = Even smaller header

Paragraphs

This is a normal paragraph. Write whatever blah you want here.

Another paragraph just for show. Links work too!
use <p> for paragraphs

Text fuckery

Bold blah

Italic blah

Emphasized blah

Lists

Unordered list:

  • First blah item
  • Second blah item
  • Third blah item

Ordered list:

  1. Step one blah
  2. Step two blah
  3. Step three blah

Images

Example image blah:

Blockquotes

This is a quote blah. Perfect for meme sayings or references.

Code

Use <code> for inline code like const blah_five = 5;

Line breaks & horizontal rules

Line one blah
Line two blah
Line three blah
